formattedAddress: 435 E 85th St, New York, NY 10028, USA
adrFormatAddress: 435 E 85th St, New York, NY 10028, USA

editorialSummary.text: Bus tour operator providing a range of tours of popular film & TV locations throughout the city.

originalText.text: The tour was amazing and doubled as a historical tour of New York. Katherine was the best tour guide, dressed to the nines and had intimate details from the set of Maisel due to her experience working on set. She was patient with us and let us linger in every spot in order to fully immerse ourselves in the experience. She even gave me great thrift store recommendations (which I went to after and bought a large bag of cute clothes). 10/10 recommend going and you‚Äôll be lucky to get Katherine !

originalText.text: One of the Best enthusiastically entertaining tour I‚Äôve experienced so far in NYC! Cathrine is doing everything right! Her sweet spirit & knowledge of all the different places in Central Park made for a fabulous tour.

text.text: One of the Best enthusiastically entertaining tour I‚Äôve experienced so far in NYC! Cathrine is doing everything right! Her sweet spirit & knowledge of all the different places in Central Park made for a fabulous tour.

originalText.text: My husband and I did the Central Park TV & Movie tour, and our guide was Hanna. We were blown away with how breathtaking the park really is. So incredibly beautiful. The tour lasted about 1.5 hours and Hanna did a fantastic job making sure the tour group of 16 could all hear, participate and enjoy. There was always time for photos and we had a brief break in the middle for snacks and restrooms. I would definitely consider another tour with this company next time we visit NYC.

originalText.text: GREAT tour. 5‚≠êÔ∏è - booked the NYC TV and Movie Bus Tour Dec 1, 2023 for my husband, teen and 10 year old daughters while on a short trip to NYC. Our tour guide (Benji üíï) and bus driver (John üòò) were fantastic. The bus is very comfortable, clean and windows are very large to be able to easily see out both sides, regardless of where you are sitting. Benji asked the group for any special interests and was able to point out numerous points of interest along the way as well as provide a wealth of history relating to TV/Movies and NYC. It was raining at one point and he was happy to stand in rain and take pictures for all of us. The traffic was a bit hard to predict (welcome to NYC!) but they checked with entire group to ensure no one had any conflicts. My teen, hubby and I were impressed by the history, my 10 year old was happy to look around and see the sites. Recommend for anyone looking to see more of the city with a safe (thanks John!), comfortable ride with an extremely well informed and personable tour guide (thanks Benji!!). 5‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è

originalText.text: Laura is an exceptional guide, the Central Park TV & Movie sites tour was informational and brought back several memories for all the family. Laura is funny and had us captured throughout. Highly recommend the tour and ask for guide Laura!!
